裡.definition: lining; interior; inside; internal; also written 裏|里[li3]

裡出外進.definition: uneven; in disorder; everything sticking out

裡勾外連.definition: to act from inside in coordination with attackers outside; attacked from both inside and out

裡子.definition: lining; (fig.) substance (as opposed to outward appearance)

裡應外合.definition: to coordinate outside and inside offensives (idiom); (fig.) to act together

裡手.definition: expert; left-hand side (of a machine); left-hand side (driver's side) of a vehicle

裡海地鴉.definition: (bird species of China) Turkestan ground jay; Pander's ground jay (Podoces panderi)

裡邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 裡邊|里边[li3 bian5]
